name: Duit
body:
### Welcome to Duit Github page.
This page will serve as an introduction to Duit.
Duit is a GTD (Getting Things Done) App.

It was born as a class project and as a way of learning.
Course: 2º Administración de Sistemas Informáticos en Red.

More content to be added*

### Author
Adrián Espinosa Moreno (aesptux)
On my personal webpage you can find more ways to contact me
aespinosa@aesptux.com
tagline: GTD Web Application. Simple task manager with several functions, such as Pomodoro Timer, notebooks, workspaces, etc
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
